key.name: enable-python-linter
key.description: Enable the use of pylint to find additional diagnostics in Python files. This may result in the execution of code in your project.

key.name: ext-modules
key.description: A comma-separated list of package or module names from where C extensions may be loaded. Extensions are loading into the active Python interpreter and may run arbitrary code.

key.name: linter-name
key.description: The actual python linter in use.
